data.apiNameCn: 提取简略行程或票号列表
data.introduce: 本接口可以根据姓名，护照号，身份证号，常客卡号提取简略行程列表或是票号列表。可根据获取到的票号再调用客票提取接口提取票面信息。
data.business: 根据姓名，护照号，身份证号，常客卡号提取简略行程列表或是票号列表，默认返回票号列表。
data.functions:
1、PassengerName与Document 必填其一。 当请求同时传入时，按如下优先级进行客票搜索：证件>姓名。
2、如果提出来的票号太多，主机报too many entries ，接口不会有任何报错，会返回空节点
DETR:FF不支持或无权限
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketListRetRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票前预览票面请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Airline","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航司代码","children":[]},{"name":"Departure","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"出发机场码","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerName","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名。当DocType为NM时，需填","children":[]},{"name":"Document","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"文件","children":[{"name":"@DocID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"证件号","children":[]},{"name":"@DocType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"证件类型。NI：身份证/PP：护照/FF：常客卡/NM：姓名","children":[]}]},{"name":"@OnlyOpenInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"否票面是open的客票。只能填true或false，默认值为true","children":[]},{"name":"@IsOnlyTKTno","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"是否仅返回票号列表。只能填true或false，默认值为true","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirTicketListRetRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票前预览票面返回信息","children":[{"name":"Errors","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误代码（数字）","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息（英文）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(英文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"DETRDigestResults","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"DETRDigestResult","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"返回信息","children":[{"name":"Name","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"姓名","children":[]},{"name":"TktNo","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]},{"name":"Segs","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"Seg","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"AirlineCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航司代码","children":[]},{"name":"Arrival","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"到达地","children":[]},{"name":"Departure","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"出发地","children":[]},{"name":"DepDate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"出发日期","children":[]},{"name":"FltNo","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航班号","children":[]},{"name":"Status","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"状态","children":[]},{"name":"OperateAirline","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"承运航司","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TxnId","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"ibe日志号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"DETRResults","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票号列表","children":[{"name":"DETRResult","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"票号列表返回结果","children":[]}]}]}]
